meanings.definition: To bring under municipal ownership or control.
meanings.sent1: The city municipalizes the park for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The town council municipalizes the public transportation system.
meanings.sent3: The mayor municipalizes the old factory and turns it into a community center.
meanings.sent4: She municipalizes the abandoned building, transforming it into a homeless shelter.
meanings.sent5: The decision to municipalize the water supply ensures fair access for all residents.

meanings.definition: To transfer from private to municipal ownership or control.
meanings.sent1: The government municipalizes the utility company to improve services.
meanings.sent2: The city municipalizes the parking lots to make them more affordable.
meanings.sent3: The council municipalizes the local bookstore, making it a public library.
meanings.sent4: He municipalizes the land, creating a new park for the community.
meanings.sent5: The decision to municipalize the road maintenance leads to better infrastructure.
